publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4240 Mr Jack McConnell: The Queen’s 80th Birthday—That the Parliament congratulates Her Majesty the Queen on the occasion of her 80th birthday. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*
S2M-4240 The Queen’s 80th Birthday (lodged on 13 April 2006) Alasdair Morgan*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
